text: 2|225|hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-ui maengse sog-ui malsilsuleul iyulo geudaedeul-eul hilchaeghaji anh-eusinola. geuleona geubunkkeseoneun geudaedeul ma-eum-i eod-eun geos-eul iyulo geudaedeul-eul hilchaeghasinola. hananimkkeseoneun neogeuleoi yongseohasineun bun-imyeo gwandaehi yong-inhasineun bun-ila
